name: NewsBlur
headline: NewsBlur is a personalized news reader
description: NewsBlur is a personalized news reader that brings people together to talk about the world. A new sound of an old instrument.

founders.name: Samuel Clay, Founder
founders.description: Founder of NewsBlur and Turn Touch.

NewsBlur is a personal news readerbringing people together to talk about the world
Web
iPad & iPhone
Android
Sign in
First
![](https://www.newsblur.com/media/img/welcome/04-eye@2x.png) Try out NewsBlur 
Then
![](https://www.newsblur.com/media/img/welcome/09-lightning@2x.png) ![](https://www.newsblur.com/media/img/reader/32-Arrow-Right.png) Sign up or Log in 
![](https://www.newsblur.com/media/img/welcome/welcome-mac.png)
![](https://www.newsblur.com/media/img/welcome/welcome-ios.png)
![](https://www.newsblur.com/media/img/welcome/welcome-android.png)
Log in
Sign up
Username or Email:
[Forgot?](https://www.newsblur.com/</profile/forgot_password>)
Password:
Username:
Optional
Password:
Email:
![](https://www.newsblur.com/media/img/welcome/fleuron.png)
![](https://www.newsblur.com/media/img/welcome/feature_1.png)
Real-time RSS
Stories are pushed directly to you, so you can read news as it comes in
![](https://www.newsblur.com/media/img/welcome/feature_2.png)
Original Site
Read the content in context, the way it was meant to be seen
![](https://www.newsblur.com/media/img/welcome/feature_3.png)
Shared Stories
Reading news is better with friends. Share stories on your public blurblog
![](https://www.newsblur.com/media/img/welcome/feature_4.png)
Training
Hide the stories you don't like and highlight the stories you do
![](https://www.newsblur.com/media/img/welcome/feature_5.jpg)
Full Text Search
Quickly find stories across all of your subscriptions
![](https://www.newsblur.com/media/img/welcome/feature_6.png)
Story Tagging
Save stories with custom tags for fast references
![](https://www.newsblur.com/media/img/welcome/feature_7.jpg)
Blurblog Privacy
Share stories with the world or only with your friends
![](https://www.newsblur.com/media/img/welcome/feature_8.jpg)
Third-party Apps
Supports [Reeder](https://www.newsblur.com/<http:/reederapp.com>), [ReadKit](https://www.newsblur.com/<http:/readkitapp.com>), [Unread](https://www.newsblur.com/<http:/supertop.co/unread/>), and loads more
![](https://www.newsblur.com/media/img/welcome/subfeature_1.png)
Saved Searches
Regularly used searches are conveniently given their own feeds
![](https://www.newsblur.com/media/img/welcome/welcome-ios.png)
Native iOS/macOS Apps
The NewsBlur iOS and macOS apps are free and jam-packed with features
![](https://www.newsblur.com/media/img/welcome/subfeature_3.png)
Read the Full Story
The original story from truncated RSS feeds is seamlessly expanded
![](https://www.newsblur.com/media/img/welcome/welcome-android.png)
First-class Android App
The NewsBlur Android app is free and has it all
![](https://www.newsblur.com/media/img/welcome/subfeature_5.png)
Track Changes
See how a story evolved since it was first published
![](https://www.newsblur.com/media/img/welcome/subfeature_6.png)
IFTTT Support
Hook NewsBlur up to nearly every service on the web
![](https://www.newsblur.com/media/img/welcome/subfeature_7.png)
Email Newsletters
Read your email newsletters where they belong, in a news reader
![](https://www.newsblur.com/media/img/welcome/subfeature_8.png)
Grid, List, Split, Magazine
Every site has its own story layout, so you can mix and match
![](https://www.newsblur.com/media/img/welcome/subfeature_9.png)
Dark Mode
Easy on the eyes and built into the web, iOS, and Android
![](https://www.newsblur.com/media/img/welcome/subfeature_10.png)
YouTube
Even sites that don't publish RSS feeds can be followed
## Pricing
NewsBlur is free on the web, iPad, iPhone, and Android. By subscribing to a premium account, you support a growing service and unlock a few restrictions.
Free Account |  $36 / year Premium Subscription  |  $99 / year Premium Archive Subscription   
---|---|---  
Number of sites | Up to 64 sites | 1,000 sites | Unlimited sites  
River of News | Only 3 stories at a time | Every story from every site | Plus every story ever published in the archive  
Search | - | Search for recent stories, your saved stories, and shared stories | Search the entire history of every site  
Related stories | Discover only related sites | Peek into related stories and sites | Entire archive of related stories and sites  
Custom RSS | - | Only saved stories | Saved stories + folders  
Site updates | 1X | Up to 10X as often | Same as premium  
Saved story tagging | Only save stories | Tag saved stories | Same as premium  
Privacy | Public shares only | Public, protected, and private shares | Same as premium  
Full text | Only what's in the feed | Full text of each story | Same as premium  
Feed poor Lyric  | She goes hungry |  ![](https://www.newsblur.com/media/img/reader/lyric.jpg)Home cooked meals of green beans, sweet potatoes, carrots, and brown rice  
##### 
[](https://www.newsblur.com/<#>) [](https://www.newsblur.com/<#>)
What's New
###  New Features 
Feb 03, 2025 | Discover related sites (free+premium) and stories (premium archive only). [Read the blog post](https://www.newsblur.com/<https:/blog.newsblur.com/2025/02/02/discover-related-stories-and-sites/>).  
---|---  
Nov 05, 2024 | Premium archive subscriptions now backfill all of your YouTube subscriptions, so you can search, save, and share links to all of your favorite YT videos.  
Oct 25, 2024 | NewsBlur’s new native macOS App offers news notifications directly on your desktop. [Read the blog post](https://www.newsblur.com/<http:/blog.newsblur.com/2024/10/22/newsblur-macos-app/>).  
###  Community Feedback 
14 hours ago |  problem [Fetching story text doesn’t work (Android)](https://www.newsblur.com/<https:/forum.newsblur.com/t/fetching-story-text-doesnt-work-android/11479/4>)  
---|---  
15 hours ago |  problem [Feed Retrieval Problems: 403 Errors](https://www.newsblur.com/<https:/forum.newsblur.com/t/feed-retrieval-problems-403-errors/10761/54>)  
21 hours ago |  problem [Cannot drag MacOS window](https://www.newsblur.com/<https:/forum.newsblur.com/t/cannot-drag-macos-window/11499/1>)  
22 hours ago |  question [New Feeds Contain Only 10 Stories](https://www.newsblur.com/<https:/forum.newsblur.com/t/new-feeds-contain-only-10-stories/11424/7>)

' fit_markdown='' fit_html=''
generated_description:
**NewsBlur: Your Personalized News Reader**

Founded in 2012 and hailing from the bustling hub of San Francisco, NewsBlur aims to revolutionize how you consume news. Imagine a personalized news reader that not only delivers the stories you care about but also fosters conversation around them. It’s a refreshing take on an old idea, integrating community into the reading experience.

Initially part of Y Combinator’s S12 batch, NewsBlur has a mission at its core: to unite people through the news. It’s like having a cosmic newsroom that feeds your curiosity, making it easier to engage with the world.

### What NewsBlur Offers

The platform boasts a range of features designed to cater to different reading preferences:
- **Real-time RSS Feeds**: News stories are pushed straight to you as they happen.
- **Original Context**: Read articles in the context they were meant to be viewed, rather than just snippets.
- **Shared Stories**: Connect with friends through story sharing on your public blurblog.
- **Personalized Training**: Train the reader to filter out stories you don’t like and highlight those that matter to you.
- **Advanced Search and Tagging**: Quickly locate stories across all your subscriptions and save your favorites with custom tags.

### Platform Availability

You can access NewsBlur for free on the web, iPad, iPhone, and Android devices. They also offer premium subscriptions that unlock additional features:
- **Free Account**: Up to 64 website subscriptions, limited story interactions.
- **Premium Subscription ($36/year)**: Expand to 1,000 sites and access all stories from those sites.
- **Premium Archive Subscription ($99/year)**: Unlimited access to sites and their entire historical content.

### What's New?

NewsBlur isn’t static; it’s continuously evolving based on user feedback and technological advancements. Recent updates include a native macOS application with desktop notifications and integration capabilities with YouTube subscriptions.

### The Bottom Line

NewsBlur does more than just present news; it creates a space where readers can interact, share, and explore stories together. With just one employee and guidance from their Group Partner, Nan, this small startup is aiming to redefine news consumption.

Interested? You can start your journey at [NewsBlur](https://www.newsblur.com) and dive into a new way of experiencing news. If you're a reader craving a more connected digital news experience, this might just be your spot.
